00001 package modules.taskModule.entityDefinitions;
00002 
00003 import java.util.Hashtable;
00004 import java.util.Iterator;
00005 import java.util.Vector;
00006 
00007 import modules.taskModule.actions.GenerateEntityCode;
00008 import modules.taskModule.actions.ViewEntitySource;
00009 import newtonERP.common.ActionLink;
00010 import newtonERP.module.AbstractEntity;
00011 import newtonERP.module.AbstractOrmEntity;
00012 import newtonERP.module.Module;
00013 import newtonERP.orm.Orm;
00014 import newtonERP.orm.associations.AccessorManager;
00015 import newtonERP.orm.associations.PluralAccessor;
00016 import newtonERP.orm.field.Field;
00017 import newtonERP.orm.field.Fields;
00018 import newtonERP.orm.field.type.FieldInt;
00019 import newtonERP.orm.field.type.FieldString;
00020 import newtonERP.viewers.viewerData.ListViewerData;
00021 
00026 public class EntityEntity extends AbstractOrmEntity implements
00027                 Iterable<FieldEntity>
00028 {
00031         public EntityEntity()
00032         {
00033                 super();
00034                 setVisibleName("Entité");
00035                 AccessorManager.addAccessor(this, new ModuleEntity());
00036         }
00037 
00038         protected Fields preInitFields()
00039         {
00040                 // always build the field from initField and not from DB, thats mean
00041                 // that we cannot add a dynamic Field, this should not be done anywhere
00042                 // else
00043                 return initFields();
00044         }
00045 
00046         @Override
00047         public Fields initFields()
00048         {
00049                 FieldInt module = new FieldInt("Module", new ModuleEntity()
00050                                 .getForeignKeyName());
00051                 module.setReadOnly(true);
00052                 module.setNaturalKey(true);
00053 
00054                 FieldString visibleName = new FieldString("Nom visible", "visibleName");
00055                 visibleName.setNaturalKey(true);
00056 
00057                 Vector<Field<?>> fieldList = new Vector<Field<?>>();
00058                 fieldList.add(new FieldInt("Numéro", getPrimaryKeyName()));
00059                 fieldList.add(module);
00060                 fieldList.add(new FieldString("Nom système", "systemName"));
00061                 fieldList.add(visibleName);
00062                 return new Fields(fieldList);
00063         }
00064 
00065         @Override
00066         public AbstractEntity deleteUI(Hashtable<String, String> parameters)
00067 
00068         {
00069                 /*
00070                  * On ne veut pas permettre l'effacement d'entité alors on redirige
00071                  * l'effacement vers GetList
00072                  */
00073                 ListViewerData entityList = super.getList();
00074                 return entityList;
00075         }
00076 
00077         @Override
00078         public ListViewerData getList(Hashtable<String, String> parameters)
00079 
00080         {
00081                 parameters.put(getPrimaryKeyName(), "&");
00082 
00083                 ListViewerData entityList = super.getList(parameters);
00084                 entityList.addSpecificActionButtonList(new ActionLink("Voir source",
00085                                 new ViewEntitySource(), parameters));
00086                 entityList.addSpecificActionButtonList(new ActionLink("Générer source",
00087                                 new GenerateEntityCode(), parameters));
00088 
00089                 // On doit créer une entité seulement avec le [+] de son module
00090                 entityList.removeGlobalActions("Nouveau" + getVisibleName());
00091 
00092                 return entityList;
00093         }
00094 
00098         public AbstractOrmEntity getEntityDefinition()
00099         {
00100                 Module module = getModuleEntity().getModule();
00101                 String entityName = getEntityName();
00102                 return module.getEntityDefinition(entityName);
00103         }
00104 
00105         private String getEntityName()
00106         {
00107                 return getDataString("systemName");
00108         }
00109 
00113         public ModuleEntity getModuleEntity()
00114         {
00115                 return (ModuleEntity) getSingleAccessor(new ModuleEntity()
00116                                 .getForeignKeyName());
00117         }
00118 
00119         @Override
00120         public Iterator<FieldEntity> iterator()
00121         {
00122                 Vector<FieldEntity> fieldEntityVector = new Vector<FieldEntity>();
00123                 PluralAccessor accessor;
00124                 accessor = getPluralAccessor("FieldEntity");
00125                 for (AbstractOrmEntity entity : accessor)
00126                         fieldEntityVector.add((FieldEntity) entity);
00127 
00128                 return fieldEntityVector.iterator();
00129         }
00130 
00135         public boolean ContainsPrimaryKeyField()
00136         {
00137                 String primaryKeyName = buildPrimaryKeyName();
00138 
00139                 FieldEntity primaryKeyField = new FieldEntity();
00140                 primaryKeyField.setData("name", primaryKeyName);
00141                 primaryKeyField.assign(this);
00142 
00143                 return Orm.select(primaryKeyField).size() > 0;
00144         }
00145 
00149         public String buildPrimaryKeyName()
00150         {
00151                 String primaryKeyName = getDataString("systemName");
00152                 primaryKeyName = primaryKeyName.substring(0, 1).toLowerCase()
00153                                 + primaryKeyName.substring(1);
00154                 primaryKeyName = "PK" + primaryKeyName + "ID";
00155                 return primaryKeyName;
00156         }
00157 }
